transcript:
Customer: Haan sorry cut gaya tha phone.
Executive: Haan haan woh disconnect ho gaya tha network ki wajah se server ka issue aa gaya tha. Main ye keh raha tha aapke paas jo ticket generate hua hoga uski jo ticket ID hogi woh ye aayi hogi 9644893 karke.
Customer: Right.
Executive: Hai na? Toh woh woh miss call hota hai toh woh hamare paas mein generate hota hai woh ek notification aapke paas mein bhi jata hai ki ye ticket generate hua hai toh aapke paas mein call aayegi jo bhi aapke account manager honge unki. Isi wajah se maine maine pehle toh unhi ko kiya tha Parag bhai ko hi kiya tha but woh busy the meeting mein toh unhone message kar diya tha ki meeting mein hu baad mein call kar lunga.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai main isko kar de raha hu close. Aapki jo primary mail ID hai na us pe ek feedback ka jayega us pe aur primary number ke text pe jo primary number toh Parag bhai wala hi hai. Theek hai toh us pe feedback ka jayega ki call aa gayi aapke paas ya nahi aa gayi toh woh yes kar de dijiyega feedback.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Koi baat nahi.
Executive: Haan ek baar unse bol dijiyega main message toh waise dal diya hu lekin ek baar phir bhi bol dijiyega aur agar text message ya whatsapp kar lena unko.
Customer: Kar diya tha.
Executive: Kar diya whatsapp kar diya tha maine Parag bhai ko. Baki agar mail ha mail pe aata hai toh mail pe aap hi kar sakte ho.
Customer: Haan mail pe toh main revert kar lunga us ha ek baar check kar lena main abhi close kar de raha hu paanch minute mein theek hai.
Customer: Haan haan main check kar lunga usme koi issue nahi hai abhi.
Executive: Theek hai baki abhi toh kaise receipts mein kaise reh raha hai abhi aapko kis cheez ka?
Customer: Ah isme apna jaise ki ye page visit wagera mein toh sabhi ab toh theek hai na?
Executive: Page visit wagera mein toh abhi toh sari cheeze better chal rahi hai bas wahi hai ki jaise aap bol rahe ho na ki direct inquiry aur catalog views wala toh woh utna jyada improve toh dekho nahi ho raha hai theek hai woh aapko sahi cheez batau kyuki hamari jo combination chal rahe hai usi hisab se hamara sara promotion bhi chal raha hai hum log picki few jagah pe rahe hai toh woh wali sabse badi problem hai kyuki unlimited ke liye jitna jitni jaldi hum log har jagah pe dikhai dena start kar lenge utna jyada hamare liye bhi point rahega theek hai dusri cheez ye hai ki consumption aapka jo raha hai na toh aapki jo cities hai woh kafi achi ban chuki hai ab theek hai total cities se aap jo buylead purchase karte ho woh near about 56 ho gayi hai 55 man lo 56 nahi 56 mein abhi ban jayegi 55 ho gayi hai ab aap socho ki 56 alag alag location se aap buyleads ko consume kar rahe ho lekin un jagah se un sari jagaho pe aapke paas direct inquiry toh aa nahi rahi hai direct inquiry aapki aati kahan se jahan jahan aap dikh rahe ho theek hai woh hai limited jagah aapki Bangalore ho gaya Lucknow hai Faridabad hai Samastipur hai Allahabad hai Nagpur Chennai Hyderabad Kanpur Vishakhapatnam Patna Raipur Jhansi Indore Gorakhpur Bangalore yahi location hai jahan se aapke paas jyada inquiry generate hoti hogi matlab direct samne se client aa jata hoga theek hai catalog views bhi aate honge toh catalog views mostly mujhe lagta hai ki inhi location se aate honge aap toh use karte ho toh aapko bhi pata hoga abhi ki agar main baat karu catalog views ki toh catalog views kuch toh aaye honge aapke paas mein catalog views agar main dekhu abhi toh abhi nahi dikh raha hai matlab aaya hoga toh ya toh consume kar liya hoga theek hai toh usme bhi jyadatar location yahi wali hongi jo aapki ye chal rahi hai kyuki catalog aadmi tabhi dekh payega jab catalog aapka waha pe dikhai dega us location pe aapki company visual hogi jab company nahi visible ho rahi hai baki location pe jaise aap lead purchase kar rahe ho har jagah ki theek hai aur aap for example ek koi bhi ek location le lete hai ki jaise man lo meri Mumbai hai theek hai Mumbai kya hai Mumbai mein toh aapka hai hi man lo ye Bhopal hai theek hai ab Bhopal mein aap lead consume kar rahe ho lekin Bhopal mein agar ja kar ke main LED street light supplier pe ja kar ke agar search karunga na toh mujhe aapki company ka naam waha pe nahi dikhai dega agar aap bhi search karoge toh aapko aapki company ka naam waha pe nahi dikhai dega kyuki waha pe hamara koi bhi combination nahi chal raha hai na koi hamara waha pe promotion chal raha hai ab yahi cheez hamara effort wala jo maine aapko bataya tha woh agar hum chala rahe hote toh jitni jyada jagaho se aap buylead purchase karte jin jin jagaho se teen teen buylead purchase ho jati un sari ki sari jagaho mein matlab ye jo 55 bani hui hai locations in sari jagaho mein aapki company as a star supplier ke andar mein dikhai de rahi hoti har aadmi dekh raha hota ki ha yaar ye company bhi hai jo is particular product ko bechti hai ya is particular product ko bana rahi hai toh woh aapke paas utni hi inquiry ka flow bhi badhta theek hai jitna jyada aap location pe jaoge dekho simple si cheez hai sir agar aap nahi dikhai doge kahin pe toh samne wale bande ko nahi pata chalega ki Phoenix technology naam ki bhi koi company hai jo is cheez ko banati hai theek hai aapke near by ya jin jagaho pe ho waha ke logo ko toh dikh raha hai ab Noida mein baitha hua hu theek hai Noida mein main yahi pe agar search kar lu toh mere ko nahi pata hoga ki Phoenix technology karke koi company hai Gujarat ki jo is particular product ko bana rahi hai aur acha khasa sale bhi kar rahi hai achi company hai nahi pata chalega toh woh pata kaise chalega jab tak promotion nahi hoga aur woh wala promotion toh hota nahi hai sir ki har jagah aadmi ja ja kar ke bole theek hai har jagah pe branch bhi nahi khol sakte ho ki har jagah pe office khol do woh bhi possible nahi hai toh ye digital office apna khol lete hai har jagah pe apni branches banate hai woh jyada better hai maine unko bola bhi tha meri baat bhi Parag bhai se is cheez ke liye toh mere ko yahi bole the ki pehle yaar ye wala kar lete hai phir usko thoda sa dekh lete hai thodi der baad mein toh maine unko bola yahi cheez maine bola maine kaha ek sath kar lo jyada better rahega kyuki ek sath services start ho jayengi ache se promotion hone lagega toh bole ki theek hai phir ek do din ka time do main Hiren bhai se baat karke aur Pawan bhai se baat karke phir final karta hu aapka hmm mere khyal isi cheez pe baat bhi hui thi unse ek baar aap bhi boliyega shayad meri baat se jyada aapki baat manenge woh kyuki to aap hi ko la kar ke dena hai na phir ha hum toh promotion karke denge inquiry la kar ke denge convert toh aap hi ko karna hai hmm baki maine uske liye bhi bola tha maine meeting ke liye bhi bola tha aap se kya bata rahe meeting ke liye bhi nahi abhi meeting ke liye aap se bola tha arrange hi nahi hui phir are nahi yaar hame kya hua tha ki abhi itna load aa raha tha jo hai woh toh dispatch karna padega materials wagera toh abhi sab usi mein lage pade the toh abhi just free hua woh dekho na kal se thoda hua hu free theek hai aur jo apne inquiries wagera jo hai abhi jo buyleads bhi karni hai jo sab hai toh ek baar thoda nipta lete hai maine socha ha koi nahi ha ha koi nahi hai ek baar meeting apan kar lete hai ha jaisa bhi time mere ko bata dena pehle se dekho main akele toh kar lunga mera koi issue nahi hai nahi nahi unka unka unhe jaruri hai kya hai dekho main aapko koi cheez samjha du theek hai aapko call pe bhi samjhaya maine last time bhi aapko dikhaya theek hai ab jab tak basically seedhi si cheez hai sir jab tak company ka owner nahi dekhega tab tak aap bhi kuch nahi kar sakte ho main bhi kuch nahi kar sakta hum aap bol hi sakte hai ki bhai ye cheez bhi hum kar sakte hai isme humko profit milega lekin jab tak woh dekhenge nahi samjhenge nahi unko ye nahi dikhega ki ha fayda milega tab tak woh nahi ha karenge us cheez ke liye are purani service hai purani service mein toh pata hai ki kaisa business aata hai toh uske liye toh okay hai ki woh toh karna hi karna hai apne ko woh toh hame continue karna hi hai ab nayi cheez koi add ho rahi hai ek category ko ya do category ko le kar ke toh woh wali cheez thodi si alag hai usme samajhna bhi hai unko maine unko bhi bola tha toh woh mere ko ye bole the ki aap thoda sa free ho jao yaar tab main baithu bhi 10 15 minute 20 minute du bhi kyuki ab ek meeting agar karenge na toh ye man kar ke chalo aadhe ghante ka time toh chahiye hi chahiye rahega isme aapko toh pata nahi chalega hmm theek hai main cheeze dikhaunga kuch question unke bhi aayenge ki bhai ye aise hoga toh ye kaise hoga woh sari cheeze bhi rahengi toh woh thoda sa dekhna padega ha exactly ha ek baar rukna Pawan bhai please kya Pawan bhai 10 minute mein call back kar raha hu call karu haan ji toh ye wala hai isme hum log bhi wahi dekh rahe hai main bhi wahi dekh raha tha kyuki dekho aapne jaise bola na ye catalog view wala hai jaise main buylead kar raha hu abhi kuch kuch jo bhi toh phir uske buy back mein bhi kya hota hai ki clients bhi dekh rahe hai toh woh apne aap bhi aake apna visit karke ja raha hai pages pe kyuki apan bhi bechte hai unko whatsapp pe bechte hai ya IndiaMART pe bhi bechte hai kabhi kabhi kya labeling bhi karta hu main usme filter wise karte hai na toh kya hota hai ha wahi filter wagera karte hai ye sab karte hai toh kya reach bhi badh rahi hai le na le toh second thing hai but ek baar apni reach hogi normal situation hai to karoge na koi bhi buyer aayega toh usse discuss toh karoge hi karoge aisa nahi hai ki agar hum quantity ka buyer hai toh hum discuss hi nahi karenge discuss toh hum karenge hi chahe woh bhale basically le humse product ya kahin aur se le le woh ek alag matter hai woh toh uski call hai woh kahan se le raha hai but ye hai ki hum jitna acha apna product bata denge jitne apne product ki USP batayenge woh hum convince kar sakte hai samne wale buyer ko lekin agar call hi nahi lenge toh phir toh woh khatam hi ho gaya na hamare liye nahi karega phir wohi sahi hai apna beneficial wahi hota hai ki bhi ek baar apni reach hoti hai na toh kabhi chalo abhi nahi aayi toh koi baat nahi next time bhi aata hai woh jab bhi requirement aati hai toh bhi woh hota hai thoda communication agar hota hai toh acha rehta hai usme hmm wahi wali baat hai ha chalo koi baat nahi main unse ek baar baat toh kar leta hu iske regarding hai na wapas se aap ek baar thoda aap bhi ek baar kar lena main mere hisab se main toh pinch kar lunga usme toh koi issue nahi hai theek hai na okay ha theek hai okay
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's page visits and catalog views not improving.

- Wants to schedule a meeting.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the reason for low improvement.

- Executive asked the customer to remind Parag and Hiren.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will close the ticket.

- Customer will receive a feedback form.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog views, promotion, meeting, cities
